content:
Hi Team,
Could you please advice on how I can make Private Stream tab be always disclosed.
My problem is that if I get private messages from several users and the tab is closed then clicking on it all messages are marked as read and this is very disappointing.
@KIRILL By "Private Stream" do you mean "Private messages"?
@Steve Howell Sorry for typo. Yeah, I mean Private Message for sure
@KIRILL So, yeah, it's kind of annoying that when you go into "Private Messages" it makes all messages on the current page be "read." You're not seeing more effects than that, are you?
We've talked about making these interleaved views not mark messages as read, at least not till you start scrolling or moving the arrow.
One workaround is to use the buddy list to go into PMs.
@KIRILL or use the p keyboard shortcut. I agree the current design is very frustrating, and is something we're working on changing

Why no to make the list to just disclose on clicking "Private massages" and not really showing al private messages?
We already have a tab "All messages" which allows to read all list of new messages. Another option is to keep "Private messages" tab always opened but this is not so pretty.
"p" shortcut won't work in case I just want to see WHO has sent me a message and want to read only particular messages and don't read others

agreed that Private messages should just toggle the list ("all private messages" is not a useful view), or it should be kept permanently open. We're currently working on the second; the main issue is just making it prettier
@Rishi Gupta good to know it! Do you have any assumptions when it will go to production?
@KIRILL we haven't started implementation on it yet; I think we'll be able to provide more helpful answers on that in a week or two once we've done post-2.0 prioritization.
@Tim Abbott thank you for clarification!
